6. Which Brewery has the highest rated beers?
```{r}
highest_rated_by_brewery <- function(name) {
  return (beers %>% 
  group_by(Brewery) %>% 
  summarize(
   rating = mean({{name}})
  ) %>%
  arrange(desc(rating)))
}

highest_rated_by_brewery(review_overall)
```
